entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Victoria Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
